home.pitch:
I am a passionate and versatile Full Stack Developer with over three years of experience, specialising in both front-end and back-end technologies.

I have solid expertise in the Vue.js and JavaScript ecosystems, honed over two years in front-end development.

During my last experience, I have expanded my skill set further by contributing to key projects at Symbol-It, particularly with Adeo Leroy Merlin, where I’ve played a pivotal role in optimizing transaction tunnels and enhancing supplier performance systems.

My curiosity and dedication drive me to continually grow, and I thrive in collaborative environments where I can contribute innovative solutions. Fluent in English, Italian, and French, I am eager to bring my diverse skill set to a forward-thinking development team.

checkout-store.description: As a full-stack developer at Leroy Merlin, I work within the ELO team on the order funnel project, a multichannel solution aimed at transforming the in-store customer experience. I have also contributed to several other projects within the same environment, including the development of front-end libraries, back-end architecture, and Back for Front (BFF).

tasks.title: Task Design and Requirements Gathering
tasks.description: Collaborate with product managers, developers, and testers to understand project needs, define tasks, and assess technical feasibility.

tasks.title: Front-End Development
tasks.description: Create responsive and accessible user interfaces with Vue.js, ensuring compliance with accessibility standards.

tasks.title: Back-End Development and Back for Front (BFF)
tasks.description: Work with Java in a back-end and Back for Front architecture, integrating multiple back-end systems to retrieve, aggregate, and map the necessary data for the front-end.

tasks.title: Cross-Team Collaboration
tasks.description: Work closely with design, QA, and development teams to ensure consistency throughout the development cycle, from design to deployment.

tasks.title: Task Management and Product Monitoring
tasks.description: Oversee the functionality of applications, monitor performance, and quickly resolve issues to ensure system stability after deployment.

tasks.title: Product Analysis Abroad
tasks.description: Participate in international business trips to analyze products on-site, gather feedback from stakeholders, and refine solutions based on real use cases.

stocky.description: Stocky is a web application designed to simplify equipment fleet management. The application provides access to the fleet, its management, usage statistics, and billing for the equipment.

scpt-360.description: As a front-end developer at Adeo Leroy Merlin, the multidisciplinary team collaborates on a global application for monitoring supplier performance. This application provides tailored experiences for users based on their roles, with a particular focus on key performance indicators.

symbol-it.description:
I’ve worked for the internal projects of the agency Symbol-IT. This includes the RUN and BUILD of multiple JS projects:

- Colexpress: Order and billing solution for a logistics company
- Proch’Orientation (Hauts de France Region): Tools for the guidance of young people in the Hauts de France region. I participated in the front-end run of the application
- For Each Academy: Creation of a Discord bot and API integration for processes (channel creation, member addition, etc.)
- For Each Academy: Creation of an application for the management of students' progress

weather.description: App to check the current weather in the city of user's choice - Responsive Design
